phases.name: horse_entrance_1
phases.//: Entrance phase builds road for the farm house and stables reserving their placement with 2x2s of special_field. Ends in 2 road connections and uses special_field to form rectangular tiles preventing future intrusive mapgen.

phases.name: paddocks_3_3
phases.//: Left number is paddock depth on the west side, right number the east

phases.name: house_1_yard
phases.//: Farm houses should be up to 2x2 and connect on the top left when facing north.

phases.name: stables_1_paddock
phases.//: Stables should be up to 2x2 and connect on the top right when facing north.

phases.name: trail_ns
phases.//: Trail phase, spawns a trail from if paddock_end_trailhead spawned

phases.name: trail_intersect_ns
phases.//: Gets placed if the trail collides with a mapgen trail, ends trail gen and skips next phase

phases.name: trail_end
phases.//: Replaces the last piece of trail with a trail_intersect is one wasn't formed already

phases.name: forest_medium
phases.//: Forest phase, spawns forest around the trail if it spawned
